name: Symmetric Feature-based Transfer Learning
description: Homogeneous symmetric transformation takes both the source feature space Xs and target feature space Xt and learns feature transformations as to project each onto a common subspace Xc for adaptation purposes. This derived subspace becomes a domain-invariant feature subspace to associate cross-domain data, and in effect, reduces marginal distribution differences.
x_kb_article:
## References
Day, O., & Khoshgoftaar, T.M. (2017). A survey on heterogeneous transfer learning. *Journal of Big Data, 4*(1), 29. [Link](https://doi.org/10.1186/s40537-017-0089-0).
